department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: : Requirement for 330 task chairs for CRA Surrey Office Seating, delivery and installation requested for 2023-02-20
description: Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) Surrey has a requirement for the supply, delivery, and installation of 330 Task Chairs,  with an Option to Purchase additional chairs at a later date to 13761 96 Avenue, Surrey, BC. Requested Delivery and Installation: 2023-02-01, however it was moved to 2023-02-20 Requirement will be a Contract against Office Seating SA # E60PQ-120001.
